basics.name: Santiago Ospina Idrobo
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I’m passionate about technology and the magic it brings to solving real-world challenges. I love leveraging tech to create solutions that drive business growth and streamline processes. My goal is to bridge the gap between technical innovation and business needs, making a meaningful impact through my work.

images.intro: Photography is the art of light, and images are the contours of memory.

list.desc: Shot on a sunny day in Nanchang. 2024.10.05
A Ragdoll cat who stayed for a year. She's a girl.

summary.overview: Hey there! I’ve had the chance to explore and grow through some amazing projects, from building web applications to crafting immersive AR/VR experiences. With a strong focus on understanding challenges first, I then find the best technical solutions to address them. Here’s a quick snapshot of the achievements and experiences that have shaped my journey so far. Let’s dive into the possibilities we can create together!
summary.subtitle: Firstly, I will show you some achievements and experiences that have shaped my journey so far.
experiences: Build web applications using Django, Flask, FastAPI, and Ruby on Rails.
Develop SDKs for Android, enhancing app functionality and integration.
Create AR/VR applications and interactive experiences using Unity, Lens Studio, Scene Kit, and Spark AR.
Collaborate with French startups to create engaging user experiences.
Deploy applications on IIS and various PaaS platforms, optimizing for scalability and performance.
Built applications for Android tablets that launch local servers to retrieve device information for web application integration.
Develop and maintain full-stack solutions with Node.js, React, and Next.js.
Integrate Shopify to build digital storefronts for e-commerce projects.
Leverage three.js and React to create engaging web projects.
Utilize Supabase for scalable backend support, optimizing database performance.

work.name: ID Technology SaS
work.summary: Led projects and drove digital transformation initiatives for various clients.
work.role: Lead developer on digital transformation projects, helping clients modernize their operations.
highlights: Family business where I established a new business model, leading teams on projects for clients like Enka.
Focused on digitalization and automation, creating custom solutions for client needs.
responsibilities: Developed and deployed web applications using Django, Flask, FastAPI, and Ruby on Rails.
Integrated Shopify to build digital storefronts for e-commerce projects.
achievements: Established a new business model within the family business and led teams on key projects, enhancing operational efficiency through custom technology solutions for clients like Enka.

work.name: Inheritly
work.summary: Founded an app to help families manage wealth, assets, and inheritance planning.
work.role: Co-founded a startup focused on family wealth management.
highlights: Launched two app versions focusing on asset and wealth management.
Adopted modern technologies, transitioning from a Node.js backend to a Next.js and Supabase stack.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained full-stack solutions using Node.js, React, and Next.js.
Integrated with Supabase for scalable backend support.
achievements: Successfully launched two versions of the app, delivering a comprehensive tool for wealth management and inheritance planning.

work.name: Makata Studio
work.summary: Developed AR/VR applications and interactive experiences for various platforms, focusing on immersive solutions.
work.role: Developed AR/VR applications and web experiences, collaborating with French startups.
highlights: Built immersive filters and games using Unity, Lens Studio, Scene Kit, and Spark AR.
Collaborated with French startups to create engaging user experiences.
responsibilities: Developed interactive AR/VR applications and web experiences.
Utilized three.js and React for web development projects.
achievements: Developed innovative AR/VR solutions for French startups, enhancing user engagement through immersive and interactive experiences.

projects.name: Manage Ev
projects.description: A comprehensive MVP app for electric vehicle owners to manage their cars, locate charging stations, and plan efficient routes.
highlights: ⚡ Tracked multiple EVs per user, providing detailed insights on vehicle status.
📍 Displayed nearby charging stations and calculated range based on current battery levels.
🛣️ Recommended optimal routes to reduce range anxiety and maximize efficiency.

projects.name: Ekored
projects.description: A microservices-based system to streamline material handling, ensuring compliance with business rules and automating PDF transmissions to suppliers.
highlights: 🔄 Digitalized material reception, selection, and weighing processes.
📈 Improved data accuracy and accessibility across multiple devices.
📲 Enabled real-time access to operations data, accessible via web and mobile.

projects.name: Inheritly
projects.description: An innovative app designed to help families manage their wealth, assets, and inheritance plans seamlessly.
highlights: 💡 Developed two versions with evolving tech stacks to improve scalability and performance.
🔐 Secure handling of sensitive information to help families with inheritance planning.
🚀 Integrated with Supabase for real-time data and authentication.

projects.name: Urban Studio
projects.description: An immersive frontend experience designed to recreate the feel of a physical store, enhancing customer engagement.
highlights: 🎨 Built from scratch using Liquid and CSS to deliver a unique shopping experience.
🛍️ Created an interface that mimics the ambiance of a physical retail environment.
✨ Collaborated with a partner to bring creative elements and fluid navigation to life.
